properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM STORE WHERE STORE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT STORE_NAME , STORE_NO , STORE_PHONE , TYPE_NAME AS type_name FROM STORE JOIN TYPE USING(STORE_TYPE) WHERE STORE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY STORE_NO DESC)A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
